DownLoad.title: Download
DownLoad.description: Etlas application let feel the full experience as it can be used to recognize monuments, statues and landmarks with a text-to-speech technology and make your trip/tour much easier and funnier to learn new historic information about your scanned object. You can also use your favorite object to appear in your camera using the AR technology.
DownLoad.IOS: if you’re IOS download this version of Etlas.
DownLoad.android: if you’re Android download this version of Etlas.
